hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: managed_inputs
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Job will decode dbgap raw data and store it decoded dataset in s3.
Parameters: abv_name = Can be obtained from the Managed Inputs or JIRA ticket stdy_id = Can be obtained from the Managed Inputs or JIRA ticket

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Managed Inputs
mkdir data mkdir completed mkdir hierarchies mkdir processing
find data/ -type f -exec rm -rf {} \; find processing/ -type f -exec rm -rf {} \; find completed -type f -exec rm -rf {} \;
rm -rf uniq_ids.txt # pull data from raw data s3 aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 3600 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${abv_name,,}/rawData/ ./data/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "${stdy_id,,}*"
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN # decode data set java -jar jars/DbgapDecodeFiles.jar
# upload decoded files export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws s3 cp completed/ s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${abv_name,,}/decoded_data/ --recursive
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
